p: The 4 kg sunflower receptacles were collected from Da’an City, Jilin Province (123°12′45″ E, 44°52′23″ N) in October 2019 and identified by Professor Shuwen Guan, School of Life Science, Jilin University. The samples were air-dried and then crushed into powder. In each experiment, 100 g powder was extracted by hydrodistillation in Clevenger-type apparatus for 8 h [ 27]. The experiments of extraction were repeated 30 times to provide enough SEO for analysis of biological activities. SEO was stored at 4 °C until analysis.
